items.headline: Liz Truss redux? Simultaneous drop for Japanese currency and bonds draws eerie parallels
items.summary_en: New Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi differs from Truss in that she wants to spend rather than cut taxes, but both plans amount to aggressive fiscal stimulus, says Deutsche Bank.

items.headline: BJ’s Wholesale’s keeps beating profit views and the stock rises, even as sales growth disappoints
